alert.note: Alert for Baker; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:01AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, northwestern Baker, western Camden, Brantley, southeastern Ware and Charlton Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1100 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Manor to Fargo to near Belmont. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston, Nahunta, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, Hickox, Boggy Bay, Race Pond, Fort Mudge and Braganza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
